item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 11, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. FCC opens entire 6 GHz band to low power device operations (243 points | 85 comments)
2. PeerTube mobile app: discover videos while caring for your attention (254 points | 100 comments)
3. X41 Reviewed Mullvad VPN (109 points | 16 comments)
4. Launch HN: Azalea Robotics (YC S24) – Baggage-handling robots for airports (59 points | 38 comments)
5. RISC-V HiFive Premier P550 Development Boards with Ubuntu Now Available (95 points | 43 comments)
6. Borax or Baking Soda Rectifier and the glow (2003) (19 points | 2 comments)
7. Storing Times for Human Events (20 points | discuss)
8. Dioxus 0.6 – Crossplatform apps with Rust (155 points | 66 comments)
9. Pgroll – Zero-downtime, reversible, schema changes for PostgreSQL (new website) (100 points | 27 comments)
10. Gemini 2.0: our new AI model for the agentic era (511 points | 257 comments)
11. Django and Postgres for the Busy Rails Developer (90 points | 39 comments)
12. Trillium TPU Is GA (76 points | 40 comments)
13. Making memcpy(NULL, NULL, 0) well-defined (178 points | 160 comments)
14. Charge Robotics (YC S21) is hiring MechEs to build robots that build solar farms ( | hide)
15. Bankruptcy judge rejects sale of Infowars to The Onion (464 points | 696 comments)
16. Show HN: Convert your LinkedIn profile to a resume (19 points | 23 comments)
17. QEMU with VirtIO GPU Vulkan Support (3 points | discuss)
18. Voice providers face removal for failing robocall mitigation requirements (72 points | 47 comments)
19. Consider Rexx for Scripting (2022) (22 points | 16 comments)
20. Instant macOS install on Proxmox including AMD patches (3 points | discuss)
21. Helium: Lighter Web Automation with Python (126 points | 40 comments)
22. OpenLoco: An open source re-implementation of Chris Sawyer's Locomotion (42 points | 12 comments)
23. WPEngine, Inc. vs. Automattic– Order on Motion for Preliminary Injunction (296 points | 120 comments)
24. Dear OAuth Providers (60 points | 13 comments)
25. Bi-elliptic transfer orbit maneuver (49 points | 23 comments)
26. The case against Google's claims of "quantum supremacy" (151 points | 99 comments)
27. Understanding the Odin Programming Language (120 points | 47 comments)
28. Show HN: KeyTik: The All-in-One Automation Tool (27 points | 4 comments)
29. How WhatsApp for business changed the world (39 points | 97 comments)
30. Phantom Vibrations of a Lost Smartphone (33 points | 18 comments)
